Identification.LongTitle: Regulations Prescribing Agricultural Goods in Respect of Any Country for the Purposes of Imposing a Safeguard Surtax, 1995-2

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to subsection 60.01(7)* of the Customs Tariff**, is pleased hereby to make the annexed Regulations prescribing agricultural goods in respect of any country for the purpose of imposing a safeguard surtax, 1995-2, effective August 1, 1995.

Section.Text: These Regulations may be cited as the Safeguard Surtax Regulations, 1995-2.
For the purposes of section 68 of the Customs Tariff, the following agricultural goods, classified under the tariff item numbers that follow them, are prescribed in respect of any country:

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: butter and other fats and oils derived from milk (0405.10.10, 0405.10.20, 0405.90.10, 0405.90.20).
